title: How to Make a Hazelnut Milkshake

steps.headline: Prepare the ingredients.
steps.description: Get your milk, ice cream, and nutmeg ready! If you need to grind the hazelnuts, do so.

steps.headline: Add all the ingredients to the blender.
steps.description: Add in the hazelnuts, milk, ice cream/yogurt, and nutmeg. Use any kind of milk, yogurt or ice cream you want such as low fat, dairy-free, vanilla etc.

steps.headline: Blend until combined well.
steps.description: Put the blender on high and make sure there are chucks in your milkshake!

steps.headline: Pour into a milkshake glass for serving.
steps.description: Sprinkle with more ground hazelnut and a little nutmeg if desired.

text: Prepare the ingredients. Get your milk, ice cream, and nutmeg ready! If you need to grind the hazelnuts, do so. Add all the ingredients to the blender. Add in the hazelnuts, milk, ice cream/yogurt, and nutmeg. Use any kind of milk, yogurt or ice cream you want such as low fat, dairy-free, vanilla etc. Blend until combined well. Put the blender on high and make sure there are chucks in your milkshake! Pour into a milkshake glass for serving. Sprinkle with more ground hazelnut and a little nutmeg if desired.
